name: Multi Blast
description:
Schools are under attack by alien invaders! You must stop them using your Multiplication Blaster. Multi Blast makes practicing your times tables fun! 

Earn medals by beating the alien monsters. Are you quick enough to win a Silver or even a Gold medal? Completing certain times tables will reveal in-game cards. Collect 6 cards to earn a rocket piece. Once you have all the rocket pieces you can fly into space and defeat the alien mother ship.

Great for children learning multiplication at school or anyone who wants to improve.

Choose from two play modes:

Standard - Select the correct answer from three options.

Advanced - Type the answer using the on screen keypad.
